title: What to Look Forward to This Month!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Emma-san, listen! Chika brought up something really fun~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Well, she said it would be nice if the 14th of every month was a day for exchanging sweets, like how we all exchange sweets on February 14th and March 14th. It’d be great if there was such a day every month!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>That’s a nice idea! I love both making and eating sweets, so if there was such an event every month, I’d be so excited!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>It’d give us something to look forward to each month, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I wonder what would be good to make next month...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby wants jelly! Melon jelly!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Great idea! It’s the season of fresh greenery, after all~ For June, maybe Japanese red bean jelly and sherbet for July...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>All-you-can-eat ice cream in August!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hehe! It’s fun thinking about what sweets to make each month!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
